caption:
🎉 Introducing the nation’s first PadSplit loan program through Coast2Coast Mortgage! 🏠💰
Investors can now finance PadSplit properties with converted rooms without a DSCR requirement. 

This loan offers:
✅ New purchases or cash-out refinances up to 75% LTV
✅ 30-year fixed-rate term
✅ No income documents required
✅ Available for 1-4 family homes and mixed-use properties

But that’s not all! There are also other financing options for PadSplit investors, including:
🔹 Loans based on 12 months of rental history
🔹 Appraiser’s opinion of market rent
🔹 80% of Air DNA short-term rental income
🔹 Real Estate Investor Bank Statement Loans
🔹 Unleased Property Loans
🔹 Fix to rent / Fix and flip loans

To learn more about the PadSplit loan at Coast2Coast Mortgage, call 904-500-5626 or visit www.PadSplitloans.com.📞💻
#investmentjourney #howtoinvest #howtomtr
